    # åªèƒ½è¾“å…¥æ•°å­—æˆ–å«ä¸¤ä½å°æ•°çš„æ­£åˆ™

    const reg=/^\d+(\.\d{0,2})?$/;

reg.test("12"); // true
reg.test("12.1"); // true
reg.test("12.11"); // true
reg.test("12.111"); // false
reg.test("."); // false
reg.test("12.1."); // false

    # éªŒè¯æ‰‹æœºå·ç 

    const phoneReg = /^1[^0-2]{1}[0-9]{9}$/g;

    # éªŒè¯ å›ºå®šç”µè¯

    const reg = /0\d{2,3}-\d{7,8}/;

    # éªŒè¯å±…æ°‘èº«ä»½è¯

    const certTypeReg = new RegExp('^[1-9]\\d{5}(18|19|20)\\d{2}((0[1-9])|(1[0-2]))(([0-2][1-9])|10|20|30|31)\\d{3}[0-9Xx]$');

    # æ ¡éªŒä¸­å›½æŠ¤ç…§

    const certTypeReg = /^([a-zA-z]|[0-9]){5,17}$/;

    # éªŒè¯ç”µå­é‚®ç®±

    const emailReg = /^\S+@\S+\.\S+$/;

    # æ•°å­—çš„åƒåˆ†ä½åˆ†å‰²æ³•

    å°†123456789è½¬åŒ–ä¸º123,456,789

    let price = '123456789'
let priceReg = /(?!^)(?=(\d{3})+$)/g

console.log(price.replace(priceReg, ',')) // 123,456,789

    # æ‰‹æœºå·3-4-4åˆ†å‰²

    å°†æ‰‹æœºå·18379836654è½¬åŒ–ä¸º183-7983-6654

    const formatMobile = (mobile) => {
  return String(mobile).slice(0,11)
      .replace(/(?<=\d{3})\d+/, ($0) => '-' + $0)
      .replace(/(?<=[\d-]{8})\d{1,4}/, ($0) => '-' + $0)
}

console.log(formatMobile(123)) // 123
console.log(formatMobile(1234)) // 123-4
console.log(formatMobile(12345)) // 123-45
console.log(formatMobile(123456)) // 123-456
console.log(formatMobile(1234567)) // 123-4567
console.log(formatMobile(12345678)) // 123-4567-8
console.log(formatMobile(123456789)) // 123-4567-89
console.log(formatMobile(12345678911)) // 123-4567-8911

    # éªŒè¯å¯†ç çš„åˆæ³•æ€§

    å¯†ç é•¿åº¦æ˜¯6-12ä½ï¼Œç”±æ•°å­—ã€å°å†™å­—ç¬¦å’Œå¤§å†™å­—æ¯ç»„æˆï¼Œä½†å¿…é¡»è‡³å°‘åŒ…æ‹¬2ç§å­—ç¬¦

    å¿…é¡»åŒ…å«ä¸¤ç§å­—ç¬¦ï¼Œæœ‰ä¸‹é¢å››ç§æ’åˆ—ç»„åˆæ–¹å¼

    â‘  æ•°å­—å’Œå°å†™å­—æ¯ç»„åˆ

    â‘¡ æ•°å­—å’Œå¤§å†™å­—æ¯ç»„åˆ

    â‘¢ å°å†™å­—æ¯ä¸å¤§å†™å­—æ¯ç»„åˆ

    â‘£ æ•°å­—ã€å°å†™å­—æ¯ã€å¤§å†™å­—æ¯ä¸€èµ·ç»„åˆï¼ˆä½†å…¶å®å‰é¢ä¸‰ç§å·²ç»è¦†ç›–äº†ç¬¬å››ç§äº†ï¼‰

    // è¡¨ç¤ºæ¡ä»¶â‘ å’Œâ‘¡
// let reg = /((?=.*\d)((?=.*[a-z])|(?=.*[A-Z])))/
// è¡¨ç¤ºæ¡ä»¶æ¡ä»¶â‘¢
// let reg = /(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])/
// è¡¨ç¤ºæ¡ä»¶â‘ â‘¡â‘¢
// let reg = /((?=.*\d)((?=.*[a-z])|(?=.*[A-Z])))|(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])/
// è¡¨ç¤ºé¢˜ç›®æ‰€æœ‰æ¡ä»¶
let reg = /((?=.*\d)((?=.*[a-z])|(?=.*[A-Z])))|(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])^[a-zA-Z\d]{6,12}$/


console.log(reg.test('123456')) // false
console.log(reg.test('aaaaaa')) // false
console.log(reg.test('AAAAAAA')) // false
console.log(reg.test('1a1a1a')) // true
console.log(reg.test('1A1A1A')) // true
console.log(reg.test('aAaAaA')) // true
console.log(reg.test('1aA1aA1aA')) // true


    
const checkStr = function(str, type) { // å¸¸ç”¨æ­£åˆ™éªŒè¯ï¼Œæ³¨æ„typeå¤§å°å†™
  switch (type) {
    case 'phone': // æ‰‹æœºå·ç 
      return /^1[3|4|5|6|7|8|9][0-9]{9}$/.test(str)
    case 'tel': // åº§æœº
      return /^(0\d{2,3}-\d{7,8})(-\d{1,4})?$/.test(str)
    case 'card': // èº«ä»½è¯
      return /(^\d{15}$)|(^\d{18}$)|(^\d{17}(\d|X|x)$)/.test(str)
    case 'pwd': // å¯†ç ä»¥å­—æ¯å¼€å¤´ï¼Œé•¿åº¦åœ¨6~18ä¹‹é—´ï¼Œåªèƒ½åŒ…å«å­—æ¯ã€æ•°å­—å’Œä¸‹åˆ’çº¿
      return /^[a-zA-Z]\w{5,17}$/.test(str)
    case 'postal': // é‚®æ”¿ç¼–ç 
      return /[1-9]\d{5}(?!\d)/.test(str)
    case 'QQ': // QQå·
      return /^[1-9][0-9]{4,9}$/.test(str)
    case 'email': // é‚®ç®±
      return /^[\w-]+(.[\w-]+)*@[\w-]+(.[\w-]+)+$/.test(str)
    case 'money': // é‡‘é¢(å°æ•°ç‚¹2ä½)
      return /^\d*(?:.\d{0,2})?$/.test(str)
    case 'URL': // ç½‘å€
      return /(http|ftp|https)://[\w-_]+(.[\w-_]+)+([\w-.,@?^=%&:/~+#]*[\w-@?^=%&/~+#])?/.test(str)
    case 'IP': // IP
      return /((?:(?:25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|[01]?\d?\d)\.){3}(?:25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|[01]?\d?\d))/.test(str)
    case 'date': // æ—¥æœŸæ—¶é—´
      return /^(\d{4})-(\d{2})-(\d{2}) (\d{2})(?::\d{2}|:(\d{2}):(\d{2}))$/.test(str) ||
        /^(\d{4})-(\d{2})-(\d{2})$/.test(str)
    case 'number': // æ•°å­—
      return /^[0-9]$/.test(str)
    case 'english': // è‹±æ–‡
      return /^[a-zA-Z]+$/.test(str)
    case 'chinese': // ä¸­æ–‡
      return /^[\u4E00-\u9FA5]+$/.test(str)
    case 'lower': // å°å†™
      return /^[a-z]+$/.test(str)
    case 'upper': // å¤§å†™
      return /^[A-Z]+$/.test(str)
    case 'HTML': // HTMLæ ‡è®°
      return /<("[^"]*"|'[^']*'|[^'">])*>/.test(str)
    default:
      return true
  }
}
